channel.title: Observer follow incorrect feedback
channel.description:
#### What happened?
I was an observer in an unseen game with no classes that could change results (no Illusionist, Aristocrat, Scorned) and got incorrect results from following a player.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen?
I should have seen that player 16 visited 10, not 14 which he was swapped away from.
#### Steps to reproduce:
1. Observer [9] follows Physician [16] 2. Physician [16] heals Physician [14] 3. Court Wizard [10] swaps himself and Physician [14]
> Observer [9] results: https://steamuserimages-a.akamaihd.net/ugc/950710452452497899/59EF2C1140D591FD911FCBB4EDF35703E69368F8/
> Physician [16] results: https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/385279299596320768/480555878840270850/unknown.png

item.title: Observer follow incorrect feedback
item.dc:creator: Navi
item.description:
What happened?

I was an observer in an unseen game with no classes that could change results (no Illusionist, Aristocrat, Scorned) and got incorrect results from following a player.

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

I should have seen that player 16 visited 10, not 14 which he was swapped away from.

Steps to reproduce:

  1. Observer [9] follows Physician [16]
  2. Physician [16] heals Physician [14]
  3. Court Wizard [10] swaps himself and Physician [14]

Observer [9] results:
https://steamuserimages-a.akamaihd.net/ugc/950710452452497899/59EF2C1140D591FD911FCBB4EDF35703E69368F8/

Physician [16] results:
https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/385279299596320768/480555878840270850/unknown.png

Read full topic
